      • setQuota

        public void setQuota(RequestContext ctx,
            java.lang.String path,
            long namespaceQuota,
            long diskspaceQuota)
              throws IOException,
                     org.apache.thrift.TException
        Description copied from interface: Namenode.Iface
        Set the quota for a directory. Quota parameters may have three types of values: (1) 0 or more: Quota will be set to that value. (2) QUOTA_DONT_SET: Quota will not be changed, (3) QUOTA_RESET: Quota will be reset. Any other value is a runtime error.
        Specified by:
        setQuota in interface Namenode.Iface
        path - Path of the directory.
        namespaceQuota - Limit on the number of names in the directory.
        diskspaceQuota - Limit on disk space occupied by all the files in the directory.
        Throws:
        IOException
        org.apache.thrift.TException

      • setReplication

        public boolean setReplication(RequestContext ctx,
                     java.lang.String path,
                     short replication)
                       throws IOException,
                              org.apache.thrift.TException
        Description copied from interface: Namenode.Iface
        Set replication factor for an existing file. This call just updates the value of the replication factor. The actual block replication is not expected to be performed during this method call. The blocks will be populated or removed in the background as the result of the routine block maintenance procedures. Returns true if successful, false if file does not exist or is a directory.
        Specified by:
        setReplication in interface Namenode.Iface
        path - Path of the file.
        replication - New replication factor.
        Throws:
        IOException
        org.apache.thrift.TException

      • utime

        public void utime(RequestContext ctx,
         java.lang.String path,
         long atime,
         long mtime)
           throws IOException,
                  org.apache.thrift.TException
        Description copied from interface: Namenode.Iface
        Sets the modification and access time of a file or directory. Setting *one single time paramater* to -1 means that time parameter must not be set by this call. Setting *both time parameters* to -1 means both of them must be set to the current time.
        Specified by:
        utime in interface Namenode.Iface
        path - Path of the file or directory.
        atime - Access time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00 UTC
        mtime - Modification time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00 UTC
        Throws:
        IOException
        org.apache.thrift.TException
